comment: I have loved theater for as long as I can remember, and this class was so easy and so much fun. Prof. Brown had us do a group warmup in the beginning of each class, and it allowed you to get to know your classmates for all the group projects. She wasn't the best at grading properly but if you tell her in class she fixes it within a week or two.
Awful professor, doesnt grade things and doesnt keep up with due dates. Will not respond to Emails no matter what the subject it. Should not be staff at KSU, never take her.

Awesome class. We got to do Acting warm-ups each class which made it easier for us to feel comfortable around each other since we had to work in groups. She was very passionate about Theatre and was very knowledgeable. The workload was heavy but she took that into consideration when grading. She did not grade hard and I enjoyed the group final!

Professor Brown knows her theater material well but takes the class a bit too seriously for a beginner course. The class is essentially one group project where you must make and produce a 10 minute play from scratch. She is bad at keeping track of assignments and their due dates. She also does not answer emails. I would not recommend her.

She is one of the worst professors I've ever had. She takes this intro class way to serious, and assigns hw last minute. She also doesn't grade anything so you wont know what you grade is until late in the semester. There should not be this much of a heavy work load in an intro to Theatre class. This class had the most work out of my other classes
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: As someone who loved theater, this class made me hate it. She is very lecture heavy and doesnt give time for anything she assigns. She doesnt know what she wants and changes her assignments constantly so youre in a tornado of assignments and you have no clue what to actually complete. Do yourself a favor and pick a different professor.

Professor Brown was one of the worst professors I've had. Wont grade items until weeks later, and doesn't know how to run a class. Nice person, awful professor. At the end however, she gave everyone an A
rating_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: Assignments were never graded until the end of semester. Attendance is mandatory so you have to come to class. So many papers but I never knew my grade for them. She takes this class way to serious. Never responds to emails. Group projects most of the time. Fell asleep on her lectures. She was an okay professor. Not the best. Not the worst.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--SO MANY PAPERS

comment: I got an A in the class but thats because everyone got an A. We had assignments that were given to us and she only graded things over spring break and then now at the end of the semester. Grades were due for all teachers by 5pm today. Its 9:37pm as a write this and she still hasnt entered grades. She never responded to emails either. Never again

She doesn't know how to use our school website. She says that tests/quizzes will be posted and then they don't go up until a week later. She requires attendance and is not flexible with any excuses, even if it is an actual emergency. She takes the class way too seriously for a intro to theater class. Definitely would not recommend taking her class.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--LECTURE HEAVY
